<section style="padding-top: 70px;" id="about-bauhu"><div class=container><h1><span style="font-weight:500;">BAUHU</span> - Modular Buildings</h1><p style="font-weight:300; font-size:20px; line-height: 26px; color:#333;">BAUHU are a boutique provider of custom designed modular buildings specialising in hurricane resistant homes and construction services for residential customers, resort and hotel operators, and property developers throughout the world.</p><a class="btn gold-button"  style=" padding: 17px 58px !important;" href="https://bauhu.com/search">Help Me Choose</a><p>BAUHU boasts a versatile range of factory-built, hurricane resistant, prefabricated modular homes offering a wealth of unique finishes and stylish architectural features. Our attractive properties are supplied as an all-inclusive package incorporating construction materials, kitchens, bathrooms, decor items and equipment. Our engineered, modular construction system guarantees speed, accuracy, sustainability and cost certainty.</p></div></section><section style="padding-top: 70px;" id="Classic-Modular-Homes"><div class=container><h2><span style="font-weight:500;">Classic</span> Modular Homes</h2><p>A versatile range of factory built, hurricane resistant modular homes offering two to four bedrooms and a wide selection of options.
